title: Weekly Digest (9 February, 2020 - 16 February, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 43 issues were created.
Of these, 18 issues have been closed and 25 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10047 [Status mobile application privacy policy](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10047), by [serejandmyself](https://github.com/serejandmyself)
:green_heart: #10045 [App crash after upgrade nightly (with Keycard acc) on to Release (no keycard support)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10045), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10039 [ENS search is case sensitive, or so it seems.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10039), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:green_heart: #10038 [Add my nodeID to Advanced screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10038), by [adambabik](https://github.com/adambabik)
:green_heart: #10037 [[#10002] Follow up after #10008](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10037), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #10036 [EIP-747 wallet_watchAsset Interface support for Dapps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10036), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #10035 [ipfs in the settings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10035), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10032 [in onboarding, when user defines the keycard PIN passcode, he's proposed a 'cancel button'](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10032), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10031 [Allow user to change his pairing code and PUK code in the UI ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10031), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10030 [Outgoing transaction message is not replaced correctly after being signed](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10030), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #10029 [Implement Intent Filter for Android to ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10029), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10028 [Link invite Friends to join.status.im/user/...](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10028), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10026 [Resolve inaccessible Keycard multiaccount in Status](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10026), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #10025 [Predefined multiaccounts for development](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10025), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #10024 [Implement plausible deniability in keycard and status](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10024), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10023 [Back button behaves wrong in keycard multiaccount creation scenarios initiated from the login screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10023), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10020 [Transaction duplicated with lower gas](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10020), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #10018 [SwiftKey keyboard is auto correcting entered seedphrase](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10018), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #10017 [QR codes don't work for ENS names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10017), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10015 [WIP Add keycard pairing animation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10015), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #10014 [Pressing chat tab when in a chat should go back to chat list](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10014), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #10013 [iOS integration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10013), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10012 [Number of remaining keycard PIN attempts is wrong - because it can't be stored in the phone](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10012), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10011 [User with NFC disabled can't turn it back on and continue the flow smoothly](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10011), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #10010 [Keycard multiaccount doesn't show erc20 tokens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10010), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10049 [jenkins: build() doesn't like mixed arguments](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10049), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10048 [Fix malformed file](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10048), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #10046 [[#10044] Responsive new chat input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10046), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10044 [Make search new chat field responsive to edits to taps after invalid ENS searched](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10044), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10043 [[#10041] Request token price after adding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10043), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10042 [Register ETHDenver Bufficorn ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10042), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:heart: #10041 [Fiat value is '0' in added custom tokens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10041), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10040 [gas is not being estimated](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10040), by [renaynay](https://github.com/renaynay)
:heart: #10034 [don't multiply version codes by 1048576, could mess up upgrades](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10034), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10033 [Recover same acc twice test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10033), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #10027 [rename get.status.im to join.status.im](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10027), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #10022 [temporary fix for app crash if chat has long ens names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10022), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10021 [ellipsize long names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10021), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #10019 [temporary fix for slow chats with long ens names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10019), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10016 [back to infura](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10016), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10009 [[#8797] Error scrollToIndex when tapping [Fetch messages] twice in a row](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10009), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #10008 [Disallow recovering of an existing multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10008), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #10007 [[#10005] Show only 1 line of ens name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10007), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #10037 [[#10002] Follow up after #10008](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10037), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x1.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10022 [temporary fix for app crash if chat has long ens names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10022), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received 12 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 25 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 8 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10037 [[#10002] Follow up after #10008](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10037), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #10025 [Predefined multiaccounts for development](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10025), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #10015 [WIP Add keycard pairing animation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10015), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9996 [Clean up after recent tx history changes:](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9996), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #9949 [Add ENV option to enable waku-mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9949), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #9898 [add watch only address using qrcode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9898), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #9882 [Fix failed faceid clears auth settings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9882), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9390 [Add web3.keycard.signTypedData](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9390), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 17 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10049 [jenkins: build() doesn't like mixed arguments](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10049), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)

:purple_heart: #10043 [[#10041] Request token price after adding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10043), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10034 [don't multiply version codes by 1048576, could mess up upgrades](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10034), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10033 [Recover same acc twice test](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10033), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #10027 [rename get.status.im to join.status.im](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10027), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #10022 [temporary fix for app crash if chat has long ens names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10022), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10016 [back to infura](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10016), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10009 [[#8797] Error scrollToIndex when tapping [Fetch messages] twice in a row](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10009), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #10008 [Disallow recovering of an existing multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10008), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #10007 [[#10005] Show only 1 line of ens name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10007), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9995 [Offload chat messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9995), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9994 [re-enable site updates on nightly builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9994), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #9968 [Fixed cryptokitties loading/ordering](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9968), by [krzyzowiec](https://github.com/krzyzowiec)
:purple_heart: #9965 [Pending stickers status maintains after app restart](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9965), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:purple_heart: #9940 [Pass extra argument to handle multiaccounts on logout](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9940), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 17 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [jenkins: build() doesn't like mixed arguments  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3d52d1cb9cf21fa4464182714480aaab48f0d31e) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10041] Request token price after adding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/965dce053db358506a9dd87a01fc3ad80ace1c5a) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#10044] Responsive new chat input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3f6051c22bf0272af61f0076677df46cf3dfaffb) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix malformed file  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b30d002efb954c5300cd693aabcb452145acce8a) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [offload chat messages  This commit does a few things:  1) Messages are offloaded from any chat once we go back from the home. This allows us to ignore any message that is coming in from a chat we are not currently focused. 2) After 5 seconds of not-scrolling activity, any received message that is not currently visible will be offloaded to the database. 3) Similarly received messages that are not visible will be offloaded to the database directly  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4734a4ee0476dcb53ad42d1127ce096de1ebad78) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Recover same acc twice test  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d281c560dc1d44a2553e62307d727de88b94d029) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Pending stickers status maintains after app restart  Signed-off-by: Volodymyr Kozieiev <vkjr.sp@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e6c859dd2dd192c58310903a5279def629fb4b4d) by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)(https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/553f2c0e01d800079a0af9bf4e344bfbc9cf71c5) by [krzyzowiec](https://github.com/krzyzowiec)
:hammer_and_wrench: [re-enable site updates on nightly builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/dc0d0b59cb2cc3baecfb1b91a12d5b2816f7b302) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [don't multiply version codes by 1048576, could mess up upgrades  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/13c7f063174a65e2579aee89de8aa91993fe702b) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [rename get.status.im to join.status.im  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1ea49a80fc915aa3174ecfd9649c3bab6480d30d) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)(https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ff41394d9edb2a17e939128abaaca269b10b5e6e) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9902] Make Sign out go to Multiaccount overview 'Your keys' screen  Fix e2e tests  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0a7dc8fdd239dc3abfbd72645155c461750e8188) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
